page.title: 07GREAT MEOLS:PARISH MAGAZINE.
page.content: {Extract from Parish Magazine dated {January, 1985- St.John's Vicarage. } "Looking Peaceful." "One can guess the head-lines in the daily papers for the New Year,"Nuclear Holocaust Imminent", Middle East Crisis","Strike Brings Fear to Village".Strong words at Christmas Time,hard head-lines with which to greet the New Year.Not even the genius of Giles(a Cartoonist) himself,could create truly benign and humorous situations of such head-lines. The Christian must learn to live in peace,to work for peace and to pray for peace.If necessary,the Christian must enter all theatres of human conflict,the political,the industrial,the economic and the cultural in order to bring God's reconciling peace to His world." Rev.K.J.Pritchard.
